column1: Mrs. Davis, is there some kind of problem?
Yes. Please have a seat, Lorde.
Lorde, we're all big fans of your music and we think the world of you for staying and working here even after your music career took off.

Amazing, yeah. Uh... Lorde... for some time now the females at this office have been pressuring me to... uh... find your own space... to go to the bathroom.  Everyone loves you, but we thought it would be great if you had your very own executive bathroom.
You'll find all the copiers and printers in the next room over and then uh-
